topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Reports have emerged from users indicating that the investment platform Betterment may have suffered a security breach.
Sources:
- https://www.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/1q8njyv/betterment_hacked

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A threat actor is reportedly selling 40 million user records belonging to Condé Nast subsidiary websites. This follows a previous leak of 2.3 million Wired.com accounts by the same hacker.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackread.bsky.social/post/3mbyufof6pk2u

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Frontline Fabrics has filed a lawsuit against a unit of Chubb and several banks following an alleged $1.4 million fraud involving a vendor email hack.
Sources:
- https://www.insurancebusinessmag.com/us/news/legal-insights/frontline-fabrics-sues-chubb-unit-banks-over-alleged-1-4-million-fraud-561537.aspx

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The Anubis hacking group claimed to have breached Empresas Copec S.A. in Chile via a corporate VPN vulnerability, allegedly exfiltrating 6 TB of data despite partial encryption blocking.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mbylabyhll2c
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mbyladjakk2f

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The Lynx hacking group claimed a cyberattack against the Spanish transportation company Grupo Ruiz and provided data samples as proof of the breach.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mbyihzpswn2s

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A developer at Epoch Protocol lost over $20,000 after running a malicious repository linked to 'contagious interview' malware. The exploit granted attackers root access and leaked environment keys, leading to the drainage of multiple EVM and Solana wallets.
Sources:
- https://t.me/leviathan_news

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The Cl0p hacking group has claimed a breach against the Italian manufacturing company Mutti. The incident is currently pending verification.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mbxsbcicex22

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The Vect hacking group allegedly breached the Universidade Federal de Sergipe in Brazil, exfiltrating 150 GB of data. The stolen information reportedly includes administrative account hashes, student and staff records, medical data, and financial information.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mbxqxcf6td2c
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mbxs5qmh7x2c

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Truebit Protocol suffered a major security exploit targeting a vulnerability in a five-year-old smart contract, resulting in the theft of approximately 8,500 ETH (valued at $26.5 million). The incident caused the protocol's native token, TRU, to plummet by nearly 100%.
Sources:
- https://cryptopotato.com/truebit-suffers-26-5m-loss-in-first-major-defi-hack-of-2026
- https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2026/01/09/truebit-token-tru-crashes-99-9-after-usd26-6m-exploit-drains-8-535-eth
- https://thedefiant.io/news/hacks/truebit-hack-first-major-crypto-exploit-of-2026
